selection_reasoning: I am carrying forward the top performer (trial_1_5) and two trials with high structural potential (trial_1_4 and trial_1_6). The next generation will focus on refining these strategies, particularly by improving the initialization of the Basin Hopping and Coordinate Descent methods to match the robustness of the Greedy Filling approach.
